imdb.title: Speed Grapher
imdb.plot: One man will capture the heart of a woman, and destroy the foundations of society.

episodes.title: Haitoku toshi
episodes.plot: A decade after a global economic collapse, the gap between the rich and poor has widened even more. Tokyo is a nexus of corruption and decadence, where the winners have gathered to spend their fortune. When Saiga, a former war photographer, infiltrates a secret pleasure-club for Tokyo's elite, he will ignite a chain of events that could force the entire ruling class to their knees.

episodes.title: Unaru satsutaba
episodes.plot: In many ways, Kagura is like any other teenage girl. She wears her uniform, goes to school, and endures the daily lectures. But she is haunted by nightmares where she participates in darkly twisted rituals in Tokyo's secret catacombs, playing the part of a powerful Divine Goddess. In truth, Kagura is living a double life unbeknownst to her and her terrifying nightmares are far from imagination.

episodes.title: Sayonara daiamondo fujin
episodes.plot: With the ability to turn her body into solid diamond, Madam Koganei seems impervious to Saiga's attacks. Not only is she virtually unbreakable, the diamond's reflective quality makes it impossible for Saiga's camera to focus. After a high-speed chase through the city, the photographer will have to think fast to keep Kagura out of the enemy's hands.

episodes.title: Kagura no tomoshibi
episodes.plot: When health fails, everyone is in search of answers; and a cure. But an unexpected housecall from the demented Dentist is the last thing Saiga and Kagura need. The photographer will have to perfect his shooting skills to pass this sadistic drill.

episodes.title: Yudono ni te
episodes.plot: Saiga and Kagura hit the road, with Ginza and Tsujido hot on their trail, using their own unique talents. Making a detour at a remote spa, Kagura learns some shocking truths about her origins, but the biggest shocker is a glimpse into the human side of Shinsen. Just what secrets is she concealing?

episodes.title: Suitengu kuru
episodes.plot: Saiga and Kagura snoop around an abandoned research lab, searching for insight into the Divine Goddess' origin.

episodes.title: Hahakitoku sugukaere
episodes.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: Hidarite ni dakarete nemure
episodes.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: Ginza bangaichi
episodes.plot: With the latest Euphoric assassin on the loose, Saiga convinces Ginza to drive him from his hiding place to see Dr. Ryogoku.

episodes.title: Nure onna jigoku
episodes.plot: Saiga and Kagura are on the run, with the whole country looking for them. But it's one mysterious woman with a tragic past who threatens to drag the photographer to his watery doom. This assassin is not a fairy tale mermaid.

episodes.title: Hanki kessan hokoku
episodes.plot: Kagura is still free, but Suitengu has all he needs to initiate the next phase of his plan: releasing a new drug that simulates the Goddess' kiss, and will make the public unable to control their desires. Meanwhile, it's time for the Tennozu Group's semiannual audit, when even the most violent acts must be valued, and inked in the books.

episodes.title: Shinigami narikin
episodes.plot: Suitengu reflects on the tragic events of his childhood that shaped him into the man he is. It is a strange, sordid journey to the top and Suitengu sacrifices everything to get there. In recalling the ghosts of his past, the motives for his future endgame come into focus

episodes.title: Daisankyoku
episodes.plot: As the Tennouzu Group gets rich off their new line of cosmetics, Saiga and Kagura set sail for a fresh start in a new land. However, before they can vanish in the wind, they're brought back to Tokyo by a powerful new ally. Everyone's working their own angle? but are they all working towards the same goal?

episodes.title: Uso to kuchibiru
episodes.plot: Allied with Representative Ochiai, Saiga agrees to testify at the Parliamentary hearing, but only if Kagura is flown out of the country to get the treatment that could save her life. After a chance meeting at a bar with a young idealist named Joe, Saiga questions the selfishness of his motives, and resolves to bring down Suitengu himself.

episodes.title: Guddo baibureshon
episodes.plot: Betrayal is in the air. As Saiga fights for his life against a ruthless Euphoric posing as his friend, Kagura is attacked by a man who was supposed to be curing her. Meanwhile, on a stage littered with corpses, Ginza discovers the blood-stained roll call of Suitengu's club members, and finds a shocking name on the list.

episodes.title: Roppongi kuraishisu
episodes.plot: While Ginza is locked in a gun battle with Tsujido and Makabe, and American missiles threaten to destroy the building at any moment, the final showdown between Suitengu and Saiga reaches its bloody climax.
